name: Teenage Shopping Cart Midnight Joyride TURBO
name_original: Teenage Shopping Cart Midnight Joyride TURBO
description:
Ramp off of stuff, crash into things, fall over. It's all here.

WASD to walk to cart, then...
W and S repeatedly to push the cart
A and D to turn/lean
Mouse to look
Left or Right-Click to extend an arm and knock stuff into your cart
Spacebar to ride the cart once you've got some momentum, then again to hop back down.

Made for the 2013 Charity Game Jam.
